description: Try our easy to follow Quick Traditional Pizza Dough recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pizza dough,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,High protein,Soy free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Quick Traditional Pizza Dough Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 240Â°C. Grease a large baking tray. Place flour and salt into a large bowl and stir. Add yoghurt and oil. Stir until a soft dough forms. Turn dough onto a lightly floured surface and knead for 5 minutes, working in extra flour if needed, until no longer sticky.
Roll dough out until large enough to line prepared tray. Bake for 15-20 minutes or until dough is golden and crisp.
